markdownRemark.html:
The Warewulf project is pleased to announce the release of v4.5.4, now available on GitHub.

Warewulf v4.5.4 fixes a regression that was introduced in v4.5.3 that broke argument parsing for wwctl container shell and wwctl container exec.

Many thanks for our wonderful community for identifying this issue.

Let us know if you encounter any issues. v4.5.5 is already planned, and we intend to continue to improve and maintain the v4.5.x line while working on the next major release, v4.6.0.

Thank you, as always, for being a part of the Warewulf community!
